A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi\, painfully long and boring\, and incomprehensible after the first half hour. The film was an over-edited\, unmemorable \, cliche. Yes I am a Star Wars fan\, and I would love even a halfway decent film\, but this.. It's simply trash. I viewed the film in 2D imax for almost $20\, but I refuse to buy into this commercial junk anymore.
